title: Emergency Consult
visual_prompt: Dora-style cartoon: Camila, Camilo, Diego rushing with clipboards; older man (Mr. Rodriguez) touching right eye area; speech bubbles with concern

dialogue.speaker: Mr. Rodriguez
dialogue.text: Like a curtain came down over my eye!

title: Patient History
visual_prompt: Cartoon checklist on whiteboard: diabetes (✓), smoking (✓), hypertension (✓); characters reviewing chart

title: Physical Exam - The Bruit
visual_prompt: Camila using stethoscope on Mr. Rodriguez's neck; sound waves illustrated as colorful whooshing lines

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: I hear a whooshing sound - a bruit!

title: TIA Explained
visual_prompt: Dr. Erben pointing to cartoon brain diagram; red zone showing temporary blockage; arrows showing cleared flow

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Erben
dialogue.text: TIA = warning stroke. Blood flow briefly blocked.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: But it resolved - that's good, right?

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Erben
dialogue.text: It's a ticking time bomb. Next one might not resolve.

title: Ordering Duplex Ultrasound
visual_prompt: Camilo typing order; screen shows ultrasound request form; colorful icons for carotid duplex

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Let's see how narrow it is.

title: Ultrasound Results - 80% Stenosis
visual_prompt: Ultrasound image showing narrow carotid artery; yellow/orange plaque; velocity numbers in red; shocked expressions

title: Stroke Risk Discussion
visual_prompt: Chart showing stroke risk percentages; bomb icon with timer; team looking worried

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Erben
dialogue.text: With symptomatic 80% stenosis, 26% stroke risk in 2 years.

title: Decision Time
visual_prompt: Characters in circle, determined expressions; checklist: TIA (✓), High-grade stenosis (✓), Unstable plaque (✓)

title: NASCET Trial Research
visual_prompt: Camila reading large textbook; highlighted text NASCET; graphs showing benefit

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: NASCET trial: surgery reduces stroke 17% vs medical therapy.

title: CTA - The Ulcerated Plaque
visual_prompt: 3D CT angiogram on screen; zoomed view of rough, craggy yellow plaque; red danger markers

dialogue.speaker: Radiologist
dialogue.text: See that irregular surface? Ulcerated plaque.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: Pieces can break off to the brain.

title: Endarterectomy vs Stenting
visual_prompt: Split screen: LEFT shows surgical endarterectomy (cutting, removing plaque); RIGHT shows stent deployment; pros/cons listed

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: Stenting: less invasive, but risk of stroke during procedure.

title: Presenting to Vascular Team
visual_prompt: Dr. Erben presenting case on projector; vascular surgeons reviewing images; interns standing by

title: Surgical Planning
visual_prompt: Detailed cartoon neck anatomy; carotid bifurcation highlighted; incision line marked; shunt illustrated

dialogue.speaker: Surgeon
dialogue.text: We'll expose the common, internal, and external carotids.

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: What about brain protection during clamping?

dialogue.speaker: Surgeon
dialogue.text: We may use a shunt to maintain flow.

title: Neuromonitoring Discussion
visual_prompt: Diagram of EEG leads on head; monitoring screen showing brainwaves; surgeon explaining

dialogue.speaker: Anesthesiologist
dialogue.text: We'll monitor with EEG during clamping.

dialogue.speaker: Surgeon
dialogue.text: If changes occur, we place a shunt.

title: Patient Education
visual_prompt: Camila showing Mr. Rodriguez simple diagram; cartoon neck with marked incision; friendly explanation

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: We'll make a small neck incision to remove the blockage.

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: You can choose - some patients stay awake!

title: Regional Anesthesia Option
visual_prompt: Cervical block diagram; patient awake but comfortable; neurologic exam possible during surgery

dialogue.speaker: Anesthesiologist
dialogue.text: Cervical block lets us test you during surgery.

dialogue.speaker: Mr. Rodriguez
dialogue.text: You mean talk to me while operating?

dialogue.speaker: Camilo
dialogue.text: Best way to know your brain is happy!

title: OR Setup
visual_prompt: OR with monitoring equipment; EEG leads attached to patient's head; surgical team prepping; colorful monitors

title: Cervical Block
visual_prompt: Anesthesiologist performing cervical block; patient calm; numbing zones illustrated in blue

dialogue.speaker: Anesthesiologist
dialogue.text: You'll feel pressure but no pain.

title: Surgical Exposure
visual_prompt: Cartoon surgical site; carotid bifurcation exposed; color-coded vessels (common=red, internal=pink, external=orange); retractors holding tissues

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: I can see the bulge from the plaque!

title: Cross-Clamping & Monitoring
visual_prompt: Surgical clamps on vessels; EEG monitor showing stable waves; clock showing time; team watching closely

dialogue.speaker: Surgeon
dialogue.text: Clamping now. Mr. Rodriguez, squeeze my hand.

title: Arteriotomy - The Angry Plaque
visual_prompt: Artery opened lengthwise; bright yellow irregular plaque visible; crumbly texture illustrated; surgeon's gloved hands with instruments

dialogue.speaker: Surgeon
dialogue.text: Wow, look at that - angry yellow plaque!

title: Plaque Extraction
visual_prompt: Surgeon carefully peeling plaque from artery wall; plaque coming out in one piece; smooth pink artery wall underneath

title: Patch Angioplasty
visual_prompt: Surgeon sewing bovine patch onto artery; diamond-shaped patch illustrated; neat sutures; widened lumen shown

dialogue.speaker: Surgeon
dialogue.text: Closing with a patch to prevent narrowing.

title: Immediate Post-Op Check
visual_prompt: Clamps removed; surgeon checking neurologic function; Mr. Rodriguez smiling and moving both arms; thumbs up

dialogue.speaker: Surgeon
dialogue.text: Clamps off. Mr. Rodriguez, move everything.

title: Post-Op Day 1
visual_prompt: Mr. Rodriguez sitting up in bed, eating breakfast; small bandage on neck; team visiting with charts

title: Pathology Report
visual_prompt: Microscope view of plaque section; lipid core illustrated; thin fibrous cap; inflammatory cells highlighted

dialogue.speaker: Pathologist
dialogue.text: Vulnerable plaque - thin cap, large lipid core.

title: Literature Review
visual_prompt: Team reviewing meta-analysis graphs; stroke reduction curves; highlighted statistics

dialogue.speaker: Diego
dialogue.text: CEA reduces stroke by 48% in first 2 years.

title: Long-Term Management
visual_prompt: Medication list on whiteboard: aspirin, atorvastatin; lifestyle changes illustrated (no smoking, exercise, diet)

title: Patient Gratitude
visual_prompt: Mr. Rodriguez shaking hands with team; family members present; sunshine and flowers; everyone smiling

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: You did great through the surgery.

title: Dr. Erben's Teaching Moment
visual_prompt: Dr. Erben at podium; prevention pyramid illustrated; primary/secondary prevention highlighted

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Erben
dialogue.text: Prevention is key. Screen high-risk patients.

title: Team Reflection
visual_prompt: Camila, Camilo, Diego back in courtyard; satisfied expressions; sunset colors; medical journals under arms

dialogue.speaker: Camila
dialogue.text: From TIA to cure in 48 hours.

title: Next Case Preview
visual_prompt: Pagers beeping; emergency icon; silhouette of CT scan showing AAA; characters looking alert
